name: RoundingMode
description: How to round the value when scale is applied. For example, a value of 3.1415 with scale 3 could be 4.141 (DOWN, HALF_DOWN, FLOOR) or 4.142 (HALF_UP, UP, CEILING).

values.HALF_UP: Round towards nearest neighbor unless both neighbors are equidistant, in which case round up Effectively round up when >= .5, otherwise round down.
values.HALF_DOWN: Round towards nearest neighbor unless both neighbors are equidistant, in which case round down. Effectively round up when > .5, otherwise round down.
values.HALF_EVEN: Round towards the nearest neighbor unless both neighbors are equidistant, in which case, round towards the even neighbor. Effectively round up when >= .5 and next integer value is even, otherwise round down.
